timeline.bodyText: We don't need to support V2. V3 was released on 2017-07-26 and is old enough that all libraries support it. V2 is not even OpenAPI Specification as it's technically Swagger 2.0. This is a very large file we can avoid having to maintain, especially if we start developing from a spec first perspective instead of generating the spec from the implementation.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
My understanding is we wanted to support other services that may consume the spec. Not everyone may have migrated yet so this is just a nice to have.
The doc is auto generated also so there's little management overhead.
I can remove it though if we feel there's no value
replies.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: I think 3.5+ years is enough time to migrate. It is management overheard if we have to maintain both documents for "API first" development, as noted.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: Sounds good
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think we should integrate express-oas-generator into the code. This should've been a one time operation to generate the spec. From now on, we should be doing "spec first" development instead of "code first". If we use the spec to also validate input via a library (which doesn't have to be done via this ticket), then that will ensure the two never diverge.
Even if we don't integrate the spec into the validation layer, auto generate tests or use the spec for any other purpose, it is still better practice to do API design first. Hence, I think we should remove anything oas generator related regardless.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -184,10 +184,35 @@ for port in {6551..6560}; do curl -s "http://127.0.0.1:${port}/api/v1/transactio
 
 To setup live monitoring, see [monitoring](../hedera-mirror-rest/monitoring/README.md) documentation.
 
+### Open API Spec
+The REST API supports the OpenAPI (Swagger) specification v2 and v3.
+This provides documentation and structure for metrics
+
+#### View Spec UI
+We utilize the [swagger-ui-express](https://github.com/scottie1984/swagger-ui-express) package to serve our documentation based on the open api spec.
+The specification can be viewed at the following endpoints
+- `http://<ip>:<port>/<swaggerUIPath>` - Default doc serve location
+- `http://<ip>:<port>/<swaggerUIPath>/v2` - Open API v2 doc serve location
+- `http://<ip>:<port>/<swaggerUIPath>/v3` - Explicit Open API v3 doc serve location
+Where `<swaggerUIPath>` is defined by `hedera.mirror.rest.oasGenerator.swaggerUIPath`, current default is 'api-spec'
+
+#### Update Spec
+To update the spec, we utilize the [express-oas-generator](https://github.com/mpashkovskiy/express-oas-generator) package to automatically generate the spec files based off of express routes.

timeline.bodyText: The OpenAPI spec you generate is specific to /api/v1. If we ever create a /api/v2 and serve both simultaneously it would have a separate openapi spec. Thus the spec should be located under these paths. Also, you can leave off http://<ip>:<port> as it doesn't look very clean and doesn't add any value to the user. Suggest /api/v1/openapi.yaml.

timeline.bodyText:
I was confused by the api/ folder if it had to match the URL or if it contained code APIs. Would suggest naming it something more specific for clarity and having it match the corresponding config properties.
So either oas or openapi, with OpenAPI winning out in my opinion as I hadn't heard of the acronym OAS and when I googled it the Organization of American States showed up. My suggestion would be openapi/${apiVersionPath}/${config.openapi.specFileName}.yml.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
Lol at Organization of American States showing up and not Open API Specification
Notably, I actually preferred api/ folder.
Reasoning being, one of our tentative changes is a restructuring of the folder structure and the usage of express routes.
In which case one way to arrange it is with an /api/v1 folder and if a future v2 comes along /api/v2 for routes.
In those cases it would be nice to have the openapi.yml file right under the root version folder along with the route code files.
Let me know if you feel strongly and we can have the separate openapi/v1 folder structure
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.bodyText:
Would suggest removing the http://<ip>:<port>/ for the same reasons as noted previously. Would also suggest hardcoding the path to /swagger/ui, etc. for clarity then only at the bottom note that swagger part of the path can be changed via the uriPath property.
Reasoning is not everyone is a programmer and understands the concepts of variables. Also, the target audience is more likely to care about quickly finding the existing metrics URLs and not care about changing the defaults. So we should prioritize finding the default while showing how to customize it at the end.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -184,10 +184,29 @@ for port in {6551..6560}; do curl -s "http://127.0.0.1:${port}/api/v1/transactio
 
 To setup live monitoring, see [monitoring](../hedera-mirror-rest/monitoring/README.md) documentation.
 
+### Open API Spec
+The REST API supports the OpenAPI (Swagger) specification v3.
+This provides documentation and structure for metrics
+
+#### View Spec UI
+We utilize the [swagger-ui-express](https://github.com/scottie1984/swagger-ui-express) package to serve our documentation based on the open api spec.
+The specification can be viewed at the `<swaggerUIPath>` path under the appropriate version http endpoint `/api/<version>/<swaggerUIPath>`
+
+Where `<swaggerUIPath>` is defined by `hedera.mirror.rest.oas.swaggerUIPath`, current default is 'doc' e.g.
+- `/api/v1/doc` - API v1 doc serve path
+
+#### Update Spec
+To update the spec, manually modify the spec file located under the `hedera-mirror-rest/api/<version>` directory
+
+Where `<specFileName>` is defined by `hedera.mirror.rest.oas.specFileName`, current default is 'openapi' e.g.
+- `hedera-mirror-rest/api/v1/openapi.yml` - API v1 openapi spec
+
 ### Metrics
 The REST API has metrics as provided by [Swagger Stats](https://swaggerstats.io).
 Using this 3 endpoints are made available
-- `http://<ip>:<port>/<metricsPath>` - Metrics dashboard
+- `http://<ip>:<port>/<metricsPath>/ui` - Metrics dashboard

replies.bodyText:
Unfortunately can't hardcode the ui part.
Reason being the package actually adds the /ui, '/ux', '/statsand/metrics` paths.
See https://swaggerstats.io/guide/conf.html#options
If you did you hardcode ui it would read /swagger/ui/ui and swagger/ui/metrics etc.
Notably, I did try hardcoding swagger/ui and it causes a fail on startup
replies.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: Think there's some miscommunication here. I'm suggesting to remove variables when showing URL paths. Whatever the full URL path is, when showing it show it with the defaults and without a http://<ip>:<port>/ prefix. Then after mention that which parts can be customized via which variables.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

+                    type: "object"

+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"

+          in: "query"
+          example: "0.0.8"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.balance"

+          in: "query"

+          schema:
+            type: "string"

+          in: "query"
+          example: "1566560004.000000000"
+          schema:
+            type: "float"
+        - name: "publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "3c3d546321ff6f63d701d2ec5c277095874e19f4a235bee1e6bb19258bf362be"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "limit"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:

+                type: "object"
+                properties:

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000002000"

+                    type: "array"

+                      type: "object"
+                      properties:

+                          type: "string"
+                        balance:
+                          type: "number"

+                    properties:

+                        nullable: true

+                properties:

+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                          required:
+                            - "message"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: account.id"
+      tags:

+        - "tokens"

+  - name: "topics"

+info:

timeline.bodyText:
Can remove the title at the end of the string and put a description at the beginning. Something like this that appears in the REST API docs:
The Mirror Node REST API offers the ability to query cryptocurrency transactions and account information from a Hedera managed mirror node. Available versions...
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: Yeah autogeneration. Base url is probably also not needed since you'd need knowledge of it to get here anyway.
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change

                variables:
          
          
            
                  scheme:
          
          
            
                    default: https
          
          
            
                    description: The URI scheme
          
          
            
                    enum: ['http', 'https']

+  /api/v1/tokens/{id}:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/tokens/{id}"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "id"
+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Token entity id"
+          example: "0.0.1135"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  admin_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  auto_renew_account:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  auto_renew_period:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  created_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"
+                  decimals:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000"
+                  expiry_timestamp:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  freeze_default:
+                    type: "boolean"
+                    example: false
+                  freeze_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  initial_supply:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"
+                  kyc_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  modified_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"
+                  name:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "Token name"
+                  supply_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  symbol:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "ORIGINALRDKSE"
+                  token_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.1135"
+                  total_supply:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"
+                  treasury_account_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.98"
+                  wipe_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: tokenid"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "tokens"
+  /api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "id"
+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Token entity id"
+          example: "0.20.1"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.id"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "0.0.8"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.balance"
+          in: "query"
+          example:
+            - "gt:300"
+            - "lte:700"
+          explode: true
+          schema:
+            type: "array"
+            items:
+              type: "string"
+        - name: "order"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "asc"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "519a008fabde4d28d68293c71fcdcdcca38d8fae6102a832b31e802f257fd1d9"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "timestamp"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "1566560004.000000000"
+          schema:
+            type: "float"
+        - name: "publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "3c3d546321ff6f63d701d2ec5c277095874e19f4a235bee1e6bb19258bf362be"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "limit"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000002000"
+                  balances:
+                    type: "array"
+                    items:
+                      type: "object"
+                      properties:
+                        account:
+                          type: "string"
+                        balance:
+                          type: "number"
+                      required:
+                        - "account"
+                        - "balance"
+                    example:
+                      - account: "0.15.2"
+                        balance: 1000
+                  links:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      next:
+                        example: null
+                        nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                          required:
+                            - "message"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: account.id"
+      tags:
+        - "balances"
+        - "tokens"
+tags:
+  - name: "accounts"
+  - name: "balances"
+  - name: "transactions"
+  - name: "topics"
+  - name: "tokens"
+info:

+  contact:

+    email: "mirrornode@hedera.com"
+    url: "https://github.com/hashgraph/hedera-mirror-node"
+externalDocs:
+  description: "Hedera REST API Docs"
+  url: "https://docs.hedera.com/guides/docs/mirror-node-api/cryptocurrency-api"
+servers:
+  - url: "http://127.0.0.1:5551/api/v1"

timeline.bodyText:

+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Transaction not found"
+        503:
+          description: "Service Unavailable"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Require at least 1/3 signature files to prove consensus, got 1 out of 4 for file 2019-10-11T13_33_25.526889Z.rcd_sig"
+      tags:
+        - "transactions"
+  /api/v1/topics/{id}/messages:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/topics/{id}/messages"

+        - name: "id"

+          description: "Topic entity id"
+          example: 7

+          example: "2"

+            type: "integer"

+          in: "query"
+          example: "lt:1234567890.000000004"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "encoding"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "base64"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "limit"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"

+            type: "integer"

+          in: "query"
+          example: "desc"

+            type: "string"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:

+                type: "object"

+                    type: "array"
+                    items:
+                      type: "object"
+                      properties:

+                          type: "string"
+                        topic_id:
+                          type: "string"
+                        message:
+                          type: "string"
+                        running_hash:
+                          type: "string"
+                        running_hash_version:
+                          type: "number"
+                        sequence_number:
+                          type: "number"
+                      required:
+                        - "consensus_timestamp"
+                        - "topic_id"
+                        - "message"
+                        - "running_hash"
+                        - "running_hash_version"
+                        - "sequence_number"
+                    example:
+                      - consensus_timestamp: "1234567890.000000001"
+                        topic_id: "0.0.7"

+                        running_hash_version: 2
+                        sequence_number: 1

+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:

+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:

+                          properties:

+                              type: "string"
+                        example:

+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:

+                properties:

+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"

+      tags:

+  /api/v1/topics/{id}/messages/{sequencenumber}:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/topics/{id}/messages/{sequencenumber}"

+          in: "path"

+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:

+  /api/v1/topics/messages/{consensusTimestamp}:
+    get:

+          example: 1234567890

+            type: "float"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  consensus_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1234567890.000000002"

+  /api/v1/tokens:

+            type: "string"
+        - name: "token.id"
+          in: "query"
+          example:
+            - "lt:0.30000.0"
+            - "gt:0.7.25301"
+          explode: true
+          schema:
+            type: "array"
+            items:
+              type: "string"
+        - name: "limit"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+        - name: "account.id"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"

+          example: "desc"

+            type: "string"

+                          type: "string"
+                        admin_key:
+                          nullable: true
+                      required:

+                        - "symbol"
+                        - "admin_key"
+                    example:
+                      - token_id: "0.0.1"
+                        symbol: "FIRSTMOVERLPDJH"
+                        admin_key: null
+                  links:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      next:
+                        example: null
+                        nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"

+                            - "message"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: account.id"
+      tags:
+        - "tokens"
+  /api/v1/tokens/{id}:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/tokens/{id}"

+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Token entity id"
+          example: "0.0.1135"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"

+                  admin_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true

+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  auto_renew_period:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true

+                    example: "0.000000000"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000"

+                    example: null

+                    example: false

+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"

+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  modified_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "Token name"

+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "ORIGINALRDKSE"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.1135"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.98"
+                  wipe_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: tokenid"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "tokens"
+  /api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances"
+      parameters:

+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Token entity id"
+          example: "0.20.1"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.id"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "0.0.8"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.balance"
+          in: "query"
+          example:
+            - "gt:300"
+            - "lte:700"
+          explode: true
+          schema:
+            type: "array"
+            items:
+              type: "string"
+        - name: "order"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "asc"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "519a008fabde4d28d68293c71fcdcdcca38d8fae6102a832b31e802f257fd1d9"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "timestamp"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "1566560004.000000000"
+          schema:
+            type: "float"
+        - name: "publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "3c3d546321ff6f63d701d2ec5c277095874e19f4a235bee1e6bb19258bf362be"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "limit"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000002000"
+                  balances:
+                    type: "array"
+                    items:
+                      type: "object"
+                      properties:
+                        account:
+                          type: "string"
+                        balance:
+                          type: "number"
+                      required:
+                        - "account"
+                        - "balance"
+                    example:
+                      - account: "0.15.2"
+                        balance: 1000
+                  links:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      next:
+                        example: null
+                        nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                          required:
+                            - "message"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: account.id"
+      tags:
+        - "balances"
+        - "tokens"
+tags:
+  - name: "accounts"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000002000"
+                  balances:
+                    type: "array"
+                    items:
+                      type: "object"
+                      properties:
+                        account:
+                          type: "string"
+                        balance:
+                          type: "number"
+                      required:
+                        - "account"
+                        - "balance"
+                    example:
+                      - account: "0.15.2"
+                        balance: 1000
+                  links:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      next:
+                        example: null
+                        nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                          required:
+                            - "message"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: account.id"
+      tags:
+        - "balances"

replies.bodyText: Is that correct, since it also includes the /api/v1/tokens<tokenId>/balances
replies.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: Yes, but I think the tag is a way to group the top level operations e.g. /api/v1/*. Putting balances here also groups it with the top level /api/v1/balances, which I'm not sure is what we want.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
You're right. It does make /api/v1/tokens<tokenId>/balances show up in both balances and tokens group.
Which I think is valid but probably cleaner to leave it basic for now
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.bodyText:
Should provide a descriptive summary for each operation.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  summary: "/api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances"
          
          
            
                  summary: "Token supply distribution API to show token distribution across accounts. Retrieves a list of balances for a particular token."
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: Autogenerated, will fill in
replies.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText:
Went for a basic summary based on what a few other sites had. Seems like focusing and working it around get/list and returns was the focus.
We can add greater detail in description property if we want in the future but Hedera docs has that for now
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.bodyText: Think each query parameter should have a description. You can copy the description from the REST API docs.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          example: "0.0.94139-1570800748-313194300"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+      responses:
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid Transaction id. Please use \"shard.realm.num-sss-nnn\" format where sss are seconds and nnn are nanoseconds"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Transaction not found"
+        503:
+          description: "Service Unavailable"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Require at least 1/3 signature files to prove consensus, got 1 out of 4 for file 2019-10-11T13_33_25.526889Z.rcd_sig"
+      tags:
+        - "transactions"
+  /api/v1/topics/{id}/messages:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/topics/{id}/messages"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "id"
+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Topic entity id"
+          example: 7
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+        - name: "sequencenumber"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+        - name: "timestamp"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "lt:1234567890.000000004"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "encoding"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "base64"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "limit"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+        - name: "order"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "desc"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  messages:
+                    type: "array"
+                    items:
+                      type: "object"
+                      properties:
+                        consensus_timestamp:
+                          type: "string"
+                        topic_id:
+                          type: "string"
+                        message:
+                          type: "string"
+                        running_hash:
+                          type: "string"
+                        running_hash_version:
+                          type: "number"
+                        sequence_number:
+                          type: "number"
+                      required:
+                        - "consensus_timestamp"
+                        - "topic_id"
+                        - "message"
+                        - "running_hash"
+                        - "running_hash_version"
+                        - "sequence_number"
+                    example:
+                      - consensus_timestamp: "1234567890.000000001"
+                        topic_id: "0.0.7"
+                        message: "bWVzc2FnZQ=="
+                        running_hash: "cnVubmluZ19oYXNo"

+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"

+                              type: "string"

+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: topic_num"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:

+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:

+                          - message: "No such topic id - 7"
+      tags:
+        - "topics"
+  /api/v1/topics/{id}/messages/{sequencenumber}:

+          description: "OK"

+            application/json:

+                    type: "string"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "eyJhIiwiYiIsImMifQ=="
+                  running_hash:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "eyJkIiwiZSIsImYifQ=="
+                  running_hash_version:
+                    type: "number"
+                    example: 2

+                type: "object"

+        404:

+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "topics"
+  /api/v1/topics/messages/{consensusTimestamp}:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/topics/messages/{consensusTimestamp}"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "consensusTimestamp"
+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Consensus timestamp of topic message"
+          example: 1234567890
+          schema:
+            type: "float"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  consensus_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1234567890.000000002"
+                  topic_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.7"
+                  message:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "bWVzc2FnZQ=="
+                  running_hash:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "cnVubmluZ19oYXNo"
+                  running_hash_version:
+                    type: "number"
+                    example: 2
+                  sequence_number:
+                    type: "number"
+                    example: 2
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:

+                    type: "object"

+                      messages:

+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: consensus_timestamp"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:

+                          properties:

+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "topics"
+  /api/v1/tokens:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/tokens"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "3c3d546321ff6f63d701d2ec5c277095874e19f4a235bee1e6bb19258bf362be"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "token.id"
+          in: "query"
+          example:
+            - "lt:0.30000.0"

+            items:

+          example: "2"

+                        nullable: true

+          description: "Bad Request"

+          description: "OK"

+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"

+                    example: null

+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  auto_renew_period:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000"
+                  expiry_timestamp:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  freeze_default:
+                    type: "boolean"
+                    example: false
+                  freeze_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  initial_supply:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"
+                  kyc_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  modified_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"
+                  name:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "Token name"
+                  supply_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  symbol:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "ORIGINALRDKSE"

+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.1135"
+                  total_supply:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"
+                  treasury_account_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.98"
+                  wipe_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: tokenid"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "tokens"
+  /api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances:
+    get:

+      parameters:
+        - name: "id"
+          in: "path"

+          description: "Token entity id"
+          example: "0.20.1"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.id"

+          example: "2"

+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"

+                          properties:

+                    type: "array"
+                    items:
+                      type: "object"
+                      properties:

+                          type: "string"
+                        symbol:
+                          type: "string"
+                        admin_key:
+                          nullable: true
+                      required:
+                        - "token_id"
+                        - "symbol"
+                        - "admin_key"
+                    example:
+                      - token_id: "0.0.1"
+                        symbol: "FIRSTMOVERLPDJH"
+                        admin_key: null
+                  links:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      next:
+                        example: null
+                        nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"

+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:

+                          properties:

+          example: "0.0.1135"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"

+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"

+                  admin_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  auto_renew_account:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  auto_renew_period:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  created_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"
+                  decimals:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000"
+                  expiry_timestamp:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  freeze_default:
+                    type: "boolean"
+                    example: false
+                  freeze_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  initial_supply:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"
+                  kyc_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  modified_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"
+                  name:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "Token name"
+                  supply_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  symbol:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "ORIGINALRDKSE"
+                  token_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.1135"
+                  total_supply:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"
+                  treasury_account_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.98"
+                  wipe_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: tokenid"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "tokens"
+  /api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances"

+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "No such topic id - 7"
+      tags:
+        - "topics"
+  /api/v1/topics/{id}/messages/{sequencenumber}:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/topics/{id}/messages/{sequencenumber}"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "id"
+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Topic entity id"
+          example: "0.2.3"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "sequencenumber"
+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Topic message sequence number"
+          example: 2
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  consensus_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1234567890.000000003"
+                  topic_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.7"
+                  message:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "eyJhIiwiYiIsImMifQ=="
+                  running_hash:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "eyJkIiwiZSIsImYifQ=="
+                  running_hash_version:
+                    type: "number"
+                    example: 2
+                  sequence_number:
+                    type: "number"
+                    example: 3
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                          required:
+                            - "message"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: topic_num"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "topics"
+  /api/v1/topics/messages/{consensusTimestamp}:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/topics/messages/{consensusTimestamp}"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "consensusTimestamp"
+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Consensus timestamp of topic message"
+          example: 1234567890
+          schema:
+            type: "float"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  consensus_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1234567890.000000002"
+                  topic_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.7"
+                  message:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "bWVzc2FnZQ=="
+                  running_hash:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "cnVubmluZ19oYXNo"
+                  running_hash_version:
+                    type: "number"
+                    example: 2
+                  sequence_number:
+                    type: "number"
+                    example: 2
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: consensus_timestamp"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "topics"
+  /api/v1/tokens:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/tokens"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "3c3d546321ff6f63d701d2ec5c277095874e19f4a235bee1e6bb19258bf362be"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "token.id"
+          in: "query"
+          example:
+            - "lt:0.30000.0"
+            - "gt:0.7.25301"
+          explode: true
+          schema:
+            type: "array"
+            items:
+              type: "string"
+        - name: "limit"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"
+        - name: "account.id"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"

+          in: "query"
+          example: "desc"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:

+                type: "object"

+                      type: "object"

+                          type: "string"
+                        admin_key:
+                          nullable: true
+                      required:
+                        - "token_id"
+                        - "symbol"
+                        - "admin_key"

+                      - token_id: "0.0.1"
+                        symbol: "FIRSTMOVERLPDJH"
+                        admin_key: null
+                  links:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      next:
+                        example: null
+                        nullable: true

+          description: "Bad Request"

+  /api/v1/tokens/{id}:

+          example: "0.0.1135"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+      responses:
+        200:
+          description: "OK"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  admin_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  auto_renew_account:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  auto_renew_period:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  created_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"
+                  decimals:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000"
+                  expiry_timestamp:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  freeze_default:
+                    type: "boolean"
+                    example: false
+                  freeze_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  initial_supply:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"
+                  kyc_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  modified_timestamp:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.000000000"
+                  name:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "Token name"
+                  supply_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+                  symbol:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "ORIGINALRDKSE"
+                  token_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.1135"
+                  total_supply:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "1000000"
+                  treasury_account_id:
+                    type: "string"
+                    example: "0.0.98"
+                  wipe_key:
+                    example: null
+                    nullable: true
+        400:
+          description: "Bad Request"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Invalid parameter: tokenid"
+        404:
+          description: "Not Found"
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                type: "object"
+                properties:
+                  _status:
+                    type: "object"
+                    properties:
+                      messages:
+                        type: "array"
+                        items:
+                          type: "object"
+                          properties:
+                            message:
+                              type: "string"
+                        example:
+                          - message: "Not found"
+      tags:
+        - "tokens"
+  /api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances:
+    get:
+      summary: "/api/v1/tokens/{id}/balances"
+      parameters:
+        - name: "id"
+          in: "path"
+          required: true
+          description: "Token entity id"
+          example: "0.20.1"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.id"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "0.0.8"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.balance"
+          in: "query"
+          example:
+            - "gt:300"
+            - "lte:700"
+          explode: true
+          schema:
+            type: "array"
+            items:
+              type: "string"
+        - name: "order"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "asc"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "account.publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "519a008fabde4d28d68293c71fcdcdcca38d8fae6102a832b31e802f257fd1d9"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "timestamp"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "1566560004.000000000"
+          schema:
+            type: "float"
+        - name: "publickey"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "3c3d546321ff6f63d701d2ec5c277095874e19f4a235bee1e6bb19258bf362be"
+          schema:
+            type: "string"
+        - name: "limit"
+          in: "query"
+          example: "2"
+          schema:
+            type: "integer"

replies.bodyText:
Went off your suggestion and utilized a regex pattern to match since openapi can't handle our custom ':' separator as is.
One bug seems to be the ui css gets messed up but that can be an item we open against swagger-ui-express
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.message:
Added component query params and descriptions to openapi

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Utilized schema for responses

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Added version updated for openapi file

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Added regex checks for dynamic query params

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Add stateproof 200 response and localhost server option

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Added current option which improves on local host server option

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Revert trace log change

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: Inefficient regex. Can clean it up in a follow up. ^((gte?|lte?|eq|ne)\:)?\d{1,10}$
timeline.author: steven-sheehy
